dataset.title: Universidad Politécnica de Madrid, Dpto. Biología Vegetal, Banco de Germoplasma

abstract.para: This database contains information regarding the holdings of the Germplasm Bank of the Departamento de Biología Vegetal at the Universidad Politécnica de Madrid. This germplasm bank has around 10.000 accessions and is specialized in worldwide crucifer seeds (with major emphasis in the tribe Brassiceae) and in seeds of Iberian and Macaronesian endemics.

gbif.citation: Dep. Plant Biology, E.T.S.I. Agronomy, Univ. Politécnica de Madrid: Universidad Politécnica de Madrid, Dpto. Biología Vegetal, Banco de Germoplasma
